7.16.17  12:44 pm   Hey Bill regarding your whole collaboration dilemma... you know you are NEVER going to find anyone who shares your artistic/musical vision, right? But, you might find somebody who has their own vision, unique from yours, that inspires or interests you in some way...  then you can combine visions to make a super-vision. Like when the Power Rangers link up all their giant robots together to make a mega giant robot and together they defeat some intergalactic monster sent by Lord Zedd... that's what collaboration is. You don't have to compromise your own ideas and direction.
